info.title: API
info.description: The API calls to PictoPy are done via HTTP requests since we are hosting our backend on a Flask server. This was done to ensure low coupling between the frontend and the backend.

post.description: Test endpoint for object detection on a single image.

get.description: Retrieves test images for development purposes.

post.description: Adds a single image for testing purposes.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all image files in the system.

200.description: JSON object containing a list of image file paths

delete.description: Deletes a single image from the system.
Deletes multiple images from the system.

get.description: Retrieves all images and their associated object classes.

200.description: JSON object mapping image paths to their object classes

get.description: Retrieves the object classes for a specific image.

200.description: JSON object containing the classes detected in the image

post.description: Adds all images from a specified folder to the system and processes them in the background.

200.description: Message indicating the number of images being processed from the folder

delete.description: Deletes a folder and all its images from the system.

post.description: Generates thumbnails for images in specified folders.

delete.description: Deletes thumbnails for a specified folder.

get.description: Gets the progress of folder addition operation.

post.description: Creates a new album with the given name and optional description.

delete.description: Deletes an existing album by name.

post.description: Adds multiple images to an existing album.

200.description: Message confirming images were added to the album

delete.description: Removes a single image from an album.

200.description: Message confirming image removal from the album

get.description: Retrieves all photos in a specified album.

parameters.name: album_name

schema.description: Name of the album to view
schema.title: Album Name

parameters.description: Name of the album to view

200.description: JSON object containing album name and list of photos

put.description: Updates the description of an existing album.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all albums.

200.description: JSON object containing a list of all albums

get.description: Finds similar faces across all images in the database.

200.description: JSON object containing pairs of similar images and their similarity scores

get.description: Retrieves clusters of similar faces across all images.

200.description: JSON object containing clusters of images with similar faces

get.description: Finds images with faces related to the face in the given image.

200.description: JSON object containing a list of related image paths

tags.name: Albums
tags.description: We briefly discuss the endpoints related to albums, all of these fall under the /albums route

tags.name: Images
tags.description: We briefly discuss the endpoints related to images, all of these fall under the /images route

tags.name: Tagging
tags.description: We briefly discuss the endpoints related to face tagging and recognition, all of these fall under the /tag route
